column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Since I was in Chicago
column2: I had to try the deep dish pizza. Believe it or not
column3: some girl gave us a free pizza at the music festival going on! It was absolutely delicious and the tomato sauce and cheese had great flavor. The crust wasn't too overpowering
column4: but had the perfect crunch. If you're looking for a good deep dish
